entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
